title: Expedition Unknown: After the Search
overview: Expedition Unknown: After the Search takes us to Expedition Unknown Headquarters with host Josh Gates as he leads a detailed discussion with his fearless crew and special guest experts to delve deeper into the subjects explored in Expedition Unknown: Search for the Afterlife, as well as divulge never-before-seen footage and behind-the-scene moments of Gates and his team as they venture on these global explorations to better understand what lies beyond.
